snippet.title: Echoes of Mana | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Under the Mana Tree, all lore and legends shall gather. 

ECHOES OF MANA, the free to play Action RPG is coming to mobile 2022 worldwide.

Follow us for more updates:
https://twitter.com/EchoesOfManaEN
https://www.facebook.com/EchoesOfManaEN/
Echoesofmana.square-enix-games.com
